mapper.insert: insert into oopsdev.tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update oopsdev.tbl_reply set reply = #{reply},updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from oopsdev.tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
